comments.author: Marina@Picnic at Marina
comments.content: Michael, will it be available for other phones? Like once with Android system?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Hey Marina - we expect it to be on Android at some point; I'll definitely let you all know when that happens.

comments.author: Karin
comments.content: Michael, Is there a webpage with the restaurant info someplace? I have an Android phone, so can't get the app.

comments.author: Marina@Picnic at Marina
comments.content: Thanks Michael! Good luck with your project! :)

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Hi Karin - no, unfortunately no web version as of now.

comments.author: Jamie Wagener
comments.content:
Hey Michael!

So glad to have found your site last week-moving to Seattle on Monday to study naturopathic medicine at Bastyr so just downloaded your restaurant app - cant wait to use it and check out some good veg restaurants up there!!

Thank you :-)

Jamie

comments.author: Sara McMurray
comments.content: Hi Michael! I just picked up your cookbook from the Seattle Library (just before their furlough--whew!) and am completely bewitched. I've changed our dinner plans tonight, and am heading into the kitchen to sweet-talk some beets into a tartare. (I consider myself an ambassador of beets, too!) I'm looking forward to the Android app! Woohoo!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Awesome! Bewitched, I can't ask for anything better than that!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: I'm actually not sure... probably long gone.
